original_title: 怪奇！アンビリーバブル2
overview: The second installment of the popular series that focuses on psychic photography! Mr. M is troubled by the spiritual phenomenon and memorializes the psychic photos that are thought to be the cause. However, the mysterious phenomenon does not subside and only becomes intense. In the recently taken photo, there is another figure of the same spirit...
title: Mysterious! Unbelievable Shock 2
